email_content: URGENT: Your account will be suspended in 24 hours! Click here immediately to verify.
CRITICAL SECURITY ALERT: Suspicious login detected from unknown location. Immediate action required!
Re: Meeting tomorrow at 2pm - Please confirm your attendance.
ACT NOW! Limited time offer expires in 2 hours. Don't miss out on 90% discount!
Just checking in - how was your weekend?
IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Your payment of $5,000 is overdue. Pay now to avoid legal action.
FW: Project proposal document - please review when convenient
WARNING: Your computer is infected with virus! Download our antivirus NOW to protect your data!
Hey, want to grab lunch sometime this week?
FINAL NOTICE: Tax refund of $3,500 waiting. Claim within 48 hours or it will be forfeited!
Monthly newsletter - New features and updates
TIME SENSITIVE: Wire transfer of $50,000 requires your authorization within 1 hour!
Thanks for your order! Your tracking number is included below.
URGENT RESPONSE NEEDED: CEO needs you to purchase gift cards immediately for client emergency!
Quick question about the report you sent last week
SYSTEM ALERT: Database backup failed! Immediate intervention required to prevent data loss!
Hope you're having a great day! Just wanted to say hi.
DEADLINE TODAY: Complete mandatory security training or lose system access!
Meeting notes from yesterday's discussion attached
EMERGENCY: Server room flooding detected! All hands needed immediately to save equipment!
